author: Jessica Schremmer And Samantha Dawes
title: 'Go home': Backpackers face stone throwing and abuse amid coronavirus pandemic
description: Backpacker workers are losing their jobs and being told to "go home" by local community members amid fears they will spread coronavirus.
content:
Posted 
April 21, 2020 08:19:56
Backpackers in regional South Australia are losing their jobs and being told to "go home" by local community members amid fears that they will spread coronavirus.
Key points:
